actions.name: Beast Boost

cost.trigger: The user causes at least one creature to gain @Affliction[fainted].

actions.description:
Trigger: The user causes at least one creature to gain @Affliction[fainted]

Effect: The user's highest stat increases by +1 Stage for 5 Activations. If two or more highest stats are tied, the user chooses which one this Ability affects.
